original_text: I say this because many false teachers are travelling around everywhere. They do not agree that Jesus Christ was born as a human baby. People like that are telling lies. They are enemies of Christ.
korean_text: 미혹하는 자가 세상에 많이 나왔나니 이는 예수 그리스도께서 육체로 오심을 부인하는 자라 이런 자가 미혹하는 자요 적그리스도니

sentences.original_text: because many false teachers are travelling around everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 많은 거짓 교사들이 어디든 다니고 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus Christ was born as a human baby
sentences.korean_translation: 예수 그리스도가 인간 아기로 태어났다는 것을

sentences.original_text: People like that are telling lies
